channel.title: Free Games Thread
channel.description:
To pass the time until the Black Mesa release, I'd thought I'd list a few free/opensource games to keep everyone busy for the time being. :stuck_out_tongue:
Feel free to contribute to the list or discuss the games! Here are some of my favourites...
[b]Grand Theft Auto 1 & 2[/b] [url='https://www.rockstargames.com/classics']Free from the Rockstar website[/url]
[b]Elder Scrolls 1 - Arena*[/b] [url='https://www.elderscrolls.com/arena']Free from the Elder Scrolls website[/url]
[b]Elder Scrolls 2 - Daggerfall*[/b] [url='https://www.elderscrolls.com/daggerfall']Free from the Elder Scrolls website[/url]
[b]FlightGear[/b] [url='https://www.flightgear.org/']Opensource flight simulator[/url] [b]OpenTTD[/b] [url='https://www.openttd.org/en/']Opensource remake of Transport Tycoon Deluxe[/url]
[b]Frets on Fires[/b] [url='https://fretsonfire.sourceforge.net/']Opensource Guitar Hero clone[/url]
Here are also a couple of lists of free/opensource games:
[url='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_freeware_video_games']https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_freeware_video_games[/url]
[url='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_open-source_video_games']https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_open-source_video_games[/url]
* - [url='https://www.dosbox.com/']DosBox[/url] may be required to run on newer computers.

item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Red Eclipse

Yet another free and open-source “homage” to UT and Q3A that looks like it had Tron barfing all over it.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
That’s what you get when you fire the whole development studio on release day.

Simply because I can’t think of anything better, I’m going with Cave Story as best free game out there. Maybe just that I’m thinking of something with an intense storyline and ending.

But in terms of more generic titles, F2P has had a lot of impact. There’s QuakeLive, Battlefield Heroes, Vindictus, Combat Arms, etc. A lot of those suck, but you might find one that strikes a chord.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Medevilae:

Nope.

Pfft.

Commander Keen = id 1
Wolf 3D = id 2
Doom 1/2 = id 3
Quake = id 4
Quake 2 = id 5
Quake 3 = id 6
etc.

So really Rage is on id tech 712384.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: Harun
item.description:
The Powder Toy
Kind of a physics/chemistry-simulation, only much fun. It’ worth a look

Stranded & Stranded II
You are stranded on a lonely island and have to do the things Robinson Crusoe did, though there are no other humans(just some random beasts and walking food). You build and evolve. Kinda fun for a couple of hours.

Octodad
You’re father of a family of humans, only you are an octopus, meaning you have to move your tentacles with the mouse.(actually it doesn´t mean that, but you have to move tentacles with mouse anyway.)(and no, this doesn’t make sense) I found it rather boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
Nerdguy:

Aren’t the first C&C games (1,2,RA) released as freewares?

As far as I know they are. C&C Tiberian Sun and Firestorm (which im playing through now) definitely are.

https://www.escapistmagazine.com/forums/read/7.175507-EA-Gives-Away-Command-Conquer-Tiberian-Sun

For some reason, links to the EA homepage are down for me ATM so I cant give a direct link to the download page.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Well, CoD1 and United Offensive both were based on modified id Tech 3. All subsequent versions of IW’s engine were iterated from id Tech 3. There’s probably bits of code still left over in MW2’s IW 4.0.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Scrab_on_mars:

Isn’t modified id3 (almost) the same as GLDSRC?

Tech 3 is a few years newer than GLDSRC.

BahamutBBob:

id3 = Quake 1, 2, and 3, so yes.
(and all the Call of Dutys)

Nope.

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: Timmeh2k9
item.description:
Just been looking through the one of the Wikipedia lists and found something called Orbiter

Launch the Space Shuttle from Kennedy Space Center and rendezvous with the International Space Station.

Recreate historic flights with addon spacecraft packages: Mercury, Gemini, Apollo, Vostok and more.

Plan interplanetary slingshots and tour the solar system with futuristic space craft.

Design your own rockets, or download addons created by other users.

Learn about the concepts of space flight and orbital mechanics by playing and experimenting.

Definitely going to give it a try.

Read full topic

https://www.fileplanet.com/130185/130000/fileinfo/Wolfenstein:-Enemy-Territory-2.60-Patch
https://www.fileplanet.com/dl.aspx?/planetwolfenstein/files/et-2.60b.zip

Read full topic

item.title: Free Games Thread
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
The Spring Project, otherwise known of TA spring, modern engine originally recreating Total Annihilation (You can get XTA and other TA mods for free), mods expand it to make it an all-purpose freeware RTS engine basically. It’s pretty cool seeing TA in full 3D, and it has a first person mode too.

The first episode of Quake, as well as the first Episode of Duke Nukem 3D, Blood, etc. can be considered freeware, but they are really shareware.

90s game demos FTW. Even the Hexen 2 Demo (which is a great game btw) contains the first Hub of the game.

Read full topic
